Class Game

public class Game extends GameActions
Game Class Contains the important game running algorithms Extends GameActions, which contains the rules and how they influence the game

    • simulation

      public void simulation​(int min_bet, int max_bet, int init_balance, int shoe, int shuffle, int s_number, String strategy)
      Simulation mode
      Parameters:
      min_bet - minimum bet
      max_bet - maximum bet allowed
      init_balance - initial balance
      shoe - number of shoes
      shuffle - shuffle %
      s_number - number of shuffles until finish
      strategy - strategy to use
